sense.gloss: complication, confusion, disorder, chaos, dispute, conflict, trouble, quarrel
to ascertain, to confirm, to verify, to make sure of
x: 聞きただす・ききただす

sense.gloss: searching examination, establishing the facts through thorough examination
to inquire (about), to enquire, to ask
to interrogate, to question intensely, to grill (someone about something), to ask (someone) to explain

r_ele.r: ざいじょうきゅうめい

sense.gloss: closely examining (questioning) the concrete circumstances of a crime

k_ele.e: 禍福は糾える縄のごとし
禍福は糾える縄の如し
禍福はあざなえる縄のごとし
禍福はあざなえる縄の如し

r_ele.r: かふくはあざなえるなわのごとし

sense.gloss: fortune and misfortune are intertwined, fortune and misfortune come by turns, good luck and bad luck alternate (like the strands of a rope), good and bad fortune are next-door neighbours

sdata.j: ↑禍福↑↓かふく↓は↑糾↑↓あざな↓える↑縄↑↓なわ↓の↑如↑↓ごと↓し。
sdata.e: When an ill wind blows it does good to no one.

sdata.j: ↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓の↑悪弊↑↓あくへい↓を↑糾↑↓ただ↓すべきだ。
